title: Connection Issues
body: Right after champion selection I get sent to a reconnect screen and am unable to reconnect. I've tried the connection support options to no avail. Any support would be greatly appreciated. This was not a problem prior to the newest patch.

replies.body: Since you mentioned you've tried the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) already, then there might be something pretty odd going on to cause you to get disconnected in every champ select. Let's get you set up with a little one on one help from our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can do a lot more tech wizardry stuff than I'd be able to do on my end!
